Hey, you: Get a load of this cloud! High-altitude ice clouds (like this one) can help regulate Earth's temperature by reflecting energy from the Sun.

A new 
@NASAEarth
 mission called PoISIR aims to study them in greater detail to improve climate forecasts. https://go.nasa.gov/3IAfgjj

When the Relativity Space Terran 1 rocket lit up the night sky as it launched this past March, it became the first 3D-printed rocket test of its kind. Learn about GRCop—an innovative, high strength material at the center of this breakthrough: https://go.nasa.gov/44igKrA
